info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 15 at 1:11PM CDT until August 15 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Brownsville TX
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of Deep South Texas, including the following county, Hidalgo.
* WHEN...Until 415 PM CDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 111 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Overflowing poor drainage areas will cause minor flooding in the advisory area. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Mission, Pharr, Weslaco, San Juan, Alamo, Donna, Hidalgo, Progreso, South McAllen, Sharyland, Carman Elementary School, Mayfield Park, Austin Middle School, South Alamo, P S J A High School, San Juan Middle School, San Juan Public Library, San Juan City Hall, Tierra Del Sol Golf Course and Pharr Police Academy. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON
